column4: my laptop running ubuntu 12.04 occasionally loses it's touchpad functionality, seemingly after long periods without use (after or during watching a movie for example).  rebooting fixes it, but is there a better, permanent fix?
it's fairly new i'd say, it's an MSI gt780dx
Tough for me to say - I wouldn't be sure if that's because of drivers or the actual hardware.

i can tell you that i was using windows 7 as recently as 2 days ago, and i've never had an issue.  so i'd have to assume it's a driver issue.  btw, i only just made the switch from windows to linux.  you're dealing with a total newb here >.<
